title: Raj Thackeray dares MVA to take action against 135 mosques that violated SC guidelines, says ‘movement to cont - Times Now
content:
1. Raj Thackeray dares MVA to take action against 135 mosques that violated SC guidelines, says ‘movement to cont  Times Now
  2. Maharashtra On High Alert As Raj Thackeray's Loudspeaker Ultimatum Ends | NewsMo  India Today
  3. Raj Thackeray Says Loudspeaker Protest Won't Stop, 250 Detained: 10 Facts  NDTV
  4. Maharashtra government capable of dealing with those who disturb social harmony: Balasaheb Thorat on loudspeaker row  The New Indian Express
  5. Mumbai: 135 of 1,140 mosques used speakers for Azaan  Times of India
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: “It’s not only about mosques, there are several temples where illegal loudspeakers are running. I have already made it clear that it is illegal loudspeakers, not a religious issue but a social issue. This is not a one-day movement, it will continue,” said MNS chief Raj Thackeray. My point is that all illegal loudspeakers should be removed from mosques, he added.
